sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hello, you're watching Good Morning Europe. It's Tuesday the 14th of December. I'm Alistair Sanford.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Here are today's top stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Queues have been forming at UK vaccination centres after half a million people booked for a third shot against Covid-19 on the first day of a booster drive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Swedish Coast Guard prosecutors say they've opened a preliminary investigation on potential charges of gross negligence after two ships collided in the Baltic Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: And who's playing who in the Champions League after a redraw due to a technical error?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Queues have been forming at vaccination centres up and down the UK after the government announced an end-of-month target to get booster jabs in the arms of all adults, or at least to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: have an appointment for one.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Although it's hoped the symptoms from the new Omicron variant will be mild, one person in the UK has died from the virus. Its transmissibility is a major concern. While Omicron represents over 20% of cases in England, we've already seen it rise to over 44% in London and we expect it to become the dominant COVID-19 variant in the capital in the next 48 hours. At the same time, Norway is banning the serving of alcohol in bars and restaurants and imposing stricter rules in schools, while it too speeds up vaccinations to curb an Omicron outbreak.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Remote working will also be compulsory where possible. The measures will come into force overnight from Tuesday to Wednesday and are expected to last four weeks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile Denmark is pushing forward with its vaccination programme to enable everyone over 40 to receive a third booster dose.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Denmark is second worldwide only to the UK in confirmed cases of Omicron, with both countries having extensive sequencing of samples to detect variants quickly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And mainland China has reported its first Omicron case in the northern city of Tianjin. The Chinese authorities reported that it was detected in someone returning from overseas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The first case of the highly transmissible variant comes as Beijing is gearing up for February's Winter Olympics.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Boris Johnson faces a major test of his authority today as leader of his Conservative Party

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: and Prime Minister of the UK. Dozens of his own members of Parliament are expected to vote against new Covid restrictions when they come before the House later.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: His government has a big majority, but some believe he could need votes from the opposition Labour Party to pass the legislation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It would be a humiliating blow for Johnson, whose past few months have been consumed by a sequence of scandals undermining his popularity among the general public and his status as a vote-winner for the Conservative Party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: There have been inquiries into the murky ways in which his holidays and the renovation of his Downing Street residence have been paid for by friends and donors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: An embarrassing U-turn on a plan to relax the rules on lobbying by MPs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And most recently, accusations that he and his staff ignored the rules on holding Christmas parties last year, when the pandemic was much worse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Many Conservative MPs have lost patience with being told to vote for things they don't agree with and then facing predictable political consequences.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Even loyalists in the London political bubble have started to talk about Boris Johnson being on the way out as Prime Minister in a way they never have before.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But he also has a reputation for riding out the worst of political storms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And this could ultimately prove to be another of those.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Tygen Wright, Euronews, in London.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Swedish authorities are investigating whether or not drunkenness contributed to a deadly collision in the Baltic Sea. One person has died after their Danish-flanked vessel collided with

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: a British ship. Another remains missing. Matthew in the Cube has more.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Sweden's maritime authority said it was first alerted about an incident early on Monday morning involving a Danish flagged vessel and another cargo ship from the United Kingdom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They are said to have collided here, south of the Swedish town of Ustad and near towards the Danish island of Bornholm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We know that one crew member from that Danish flagged vessel has died and the other remains missing. Let's show you pictures from the scene. Although the British ship and its crew were said to be unharmed, you can see there that that Danish flagged vessel has capsized and was left floating in the water when the authorities arrived. It has now they say been towed to a Swedish port for further inspection and Sweden's Coast Guard told Euronews earlier more about the ongoing operation. People have heard screams from the water but we have not been able to confirm this so right now we're working on trying to get into the ship to see if we can locate any of the crew members on board. The cause of the nighttime collision in this busy shipping lane is still being investigated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But prosecutors with Sweden's coast guard say they have opened a preliminary investigation on charges of gross negligence and gross sea drunkenness.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Two people, a British national and a Croatian national, have so far been arrested as suspects.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's also worth noting that the Swedish authorities say they are aware of potential sea pollution caused by this collision of those two ships in the Baltic Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But alongside the search and rescue mission, they are also making sure there is no environmental impact of this incident.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Rescuers continue to search the rubble of the collapsed Mayfield candle factory following deadly tornadoes in Kentucky.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Six states in all were hit on Friday, but Kentucky and the town of Mayfield were hit the hardest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The number of dead is slowly rising as searchers work their way through the debris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We're still looking at this as a rescue effort. So every time that goes by and the temperatures that dip low in the 30s and high 20s at night is critical to make sure that we get to those individuals that still may be entrapped in that building.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But the tragic nature of the disaster is taking its toll on everyone. A few more facts about those we've lost. 18 are still unidentified.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Of the ones that we know, the age range is five months to 86 years, and six are younger than 18.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden will visit Kentucky on Wednesday to survey the damage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: He's already declared a major disaster in Kentucky, allowing additional federal aid to be channeled into the recovery efforts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: What I indicated to the government when we talked about this two days ago was that I don't want to be in the way. There's a lot going on and when the president shows up there's a long tail to follow, an awful lot of folks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, survivors are going through the wreckage of what a few days ago was their home.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: home. In the United States, the House committee investigating the January 6th riot on Capitol

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Hill has voted to recommend criminal prosecution of Donald Trump's former chief of staff, Mark Meadows.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Meadows initially cooperated with the committee and handed over records, but he's now refusing to testify.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Last month, the Justice Department indicted former President Trump's longtime ally Steve Bannon for contempt after he too refused to cooperate with the investigation into the riot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: According to documents obtained by the committee, a January 5th Meadows email indicated that the National Guard was on standby to protect pro-Trump people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Meadows has refused to explain what he meant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The issue is of high interest to congressional investigators probing whether Trump played a role in the three-hour delay between the Capitol Police's urgent request for National Guard support and their ultimate arrival at the Capitol, which had been overrun by pro-Trump rioters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A mercenary and paramilitary group is today the target of EU sanctions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Known as the Wagner Group, the EU says this organisation, backed by Russia, tortures, kills and executes people in conflict zones around the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The EU's foreign policy chief insists that the Wagner Group is responsible for serious human rights abuses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The activities of this group reflects the Russia hybrid warfare.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: They present a threat and create instability in a number of countries around the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The sanctions are directed to the group itself, eight people and three entities aligned to it, all of which are now facing a travel ban and the freezing of their assets within the whole of the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: You have this company which is waging war by proxy in a completely irresponsible way. It does not theoretically depend on any state and it's hiding behind this classification as a private company. It's doing so with total impunity as it declares itself a mercenary company.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Their role in committing some of the most grotesque breaches of human rights law is an example of the new ways in which groups and regimes engage and are involved in armed conflict, particularly Russia. Russia wants on the one hand to avoid its regular forces to be seen acting in these countries with this behavior outside the scope of international humanitarian law international conflict law cutting out of war crimes and actions totally contrary to the international law they are not interested but they are interested in having armed forces on the ground that can help one of his sides." The Wagner Group has committed destabilizing activities in Ukraine, Syria, Libya, the Central African Republic, Sudan, Mozambique and Mali. Shona Murray, Euronews, Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Brussels. the group. He is already under EU sanction for undermining peace in Libya and support of the Wagner Group, but the businessman himself denies all such accusations. His lawyers have

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: even filed a lawsuit against the editor-in-chief of the Echo of Moscow radio for calling Mr.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Prigozhin the owner of the Wagner Group. Asked whether there was a government link to Russian mercenaries in Mali. Vladimir Putin said that private military companies from Russia do not represent the interests of the Russian state and underlined that it was a private business. The Russian Foreign Ministry have stated that Mali authorities have turned to a Russian private military company to assist in the fight against terrorism and described its actions as security and advisory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Galina Polonskaya for Euronews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: The European Commission together with Poland has unveiled a multi-million euro agreement in a push to supply more vaccines to Eastern Partnership countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: The 35 million euros will include the costs related to vaccine sharing in the six countries Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Georgia, the Republic of Moldova and Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Under the terms of the deal, no country is allowed to make a profit from the move.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: The vaccination rate in these countries is significantly lower than the EU average.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It is only the vaccination that can save us all.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: And we are talking about our eastern partner countries where the vaccination average rate is only 28 percent. So it is high time to help them to speed up the vaccination rate and get everybody fully vaccinated. The first delivery under the new mechanism is set to happen in the next few weeks. It is hoped that quicker and easier access to jabs will bring the overall vaccination rate in these countries up to the WHO's target of 40 percent by the end of the year and 70 percent by the end of 2022. Indonesia has been struck by a 7.3 magnitude earthquake according to the US Geological

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Survey.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: There have been no significant damage or deaths immediately reported.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Pacific Tsunami Warning Center says there's no threat of a tsunami after earlier warnings it was possible within a 1,000 kilometers radius of the epicenter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The survivors of former USA Gymnastics doctor Larry Nassar have reached a $380 million settlement with defendant organizations. USA Gymnastics and US Olympic Committee will be forced to pay hundreds of athletes. Gold medalist Simone Biles is one of the claimants.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Nasser was sentenced to over 300 years in jail in 2018 for molesting gymnasts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: In this warehouse, all of these cases of Bordeaux wine, some of the best the region has to offer, were all seized after a robbery.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: In the last few years, the theft of fine wines and their resale to countries like China has been on the rise. Since 2018, in the Bordeaux area alone, around 20 break-ins have occurred.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: And at the beginning of the year, a major criminal wine network was broken up.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Gangs are really beginning to understand the value of good wine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: We've realized over the last 10 years that international criminal networks are diversifying their activities. As wine is a luxury product which has a market value and a significant resale capacity on the black market, they have also entered this field.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: A group of eight wine thieves who broke into a major wine merchants' warehouse in September 2020 has just received sentences ranging from one to three years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: They plundered an estimated one million euros in wine, the equivalent of 278 cases of Grand Cru, and were easily able to bypass the cellar's detection systems.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Wine merchants are now working closely with the police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: We've installed cameras around the cellars and around the buildings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: We also put padlocks on the gates and we keep the gates closed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Is that something you wouldn't have done 10 years ago?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: At that time, we didn't do that.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: 10 years ago, we didn't have any problems.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Authorities say that it is much easier to sell wine to buyers who are uninterested in its origin than other commodities like paintings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The rise in the price of Grand Cru is also another temptation, making wine thieves mouth's water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: thieves mouths water. After the initial Champions League first knockout stage draw was eventually declared void due

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: to a technical error, an official selection has now been confirmed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Manchester United will now face Atletico Madrid instead of Paris Saint-Germain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: It'll disappoint fans who would have liked to see Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi revive their old rivalry. Sports presenter Will Dalton explains what happened. The draw was first made and then they discovered there is a certain set of rules like for instance you cannot draw a club that you've faced already in the group stage, you cannot face a team from your own country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: They made a mistake in allocating the balls during the first draw.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: They had to go back and do the draw again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: However, Chelsea, the defending champions, will still be very happy with the draw.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: They drew Lille twice in both draws, a team they would fancy being able to get past.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, we can see that the La Liga champions, Atletico Madrid, who are not having a vintage season, they've drawn Manchester United.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: United had originally drawn PSG in the first round.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: It was going to be Messi against Ronaldo, but that's not going to happen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: So it's Atletico Madrid against Manchester United.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Liverpool, they originally drew Salzburg.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: They've got a slightly tougher draw now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: They've got the Serie A champions Inter Milan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Sporting Lisbon, Drouman City. Man City will be hoping and expecting, I think, to get through the Portuguese side as they still look to take home their first Champions League trophy. But the tie of the round is without a doubt Paris Saint-Germain against Real Madrid. Lionel Messi going back to Spain for the first time, of course, a huge Barcelona fan favourite.
